creator: VNG GAME STUDIOS
descriptionHtml:
★ Join with up to 125 MILLION zombie shooters in offline sniper games ★

Dead Target - free offline games 2022 is an addictive shooting game with fps themes! An easy control system that brings you a perfect shooting time killer adventure, remember it is an offline game.

Keep your defense up, your finger on the trigger, and shoot evil zombies in DEAD TARGET.

In 2040, the zombie apocalypse began. A sniper team was hired to head to the warfare, collect guns & save residential areas! These could be your last days on Earth, your last hope as a resident surviving is to join them.

Fight for survival in a zombie apocalypse with shooting games. If you don’t want to be a dead resident, don’t deny your duty, try your best to aim in these free gun games!

This offline fps game is one of the shooting games where you can:

- Kill evil zombies with legendary 3D fps weapons
- Upgrade guns and snipers to face up to non-stop zombie attacks
- Experience 3D shooting as an accurate fps engine
- Into the dead, slay zombies of all evil types
-----
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE – CAN YOU SURVIVE?
Non-stop attacks in this shooting game are coming to the frontier. Attack zombies before the invasion come to you since the evil dead can go anytime in these zombie games. Days gone after the survival duty and you can call yourself a hero!

JOIN BATTLE PASS TO COLLECT SPECIAL GUNS & MORE!
Battle Pass - An opportunity in this free game to collect survival items that can't be collected in normal mode. A series of new guns appear only once for survivors. Join the duty now to attack the evil dead and win the battle in the ultimate killing game!

INSANE FPS GAME
In this 3d fps game, zombies are designed with various deadly killing abilities. They’re not stupid. Shooters can also find loads of zombie types in this offline shooting game!

The evil dead are harming the residents, let’s hunt them down & become the best hunter!

UNIQUE GUNS
Ready to attack any evil with the huge range of arsenal. 50 deadly shooting guns & more to come for a thrilling experience in sniper games. You can upgrade and customize guns with skins to be an excellent killer in shooting games offline.

APPEALING OFFLINE FPS GAMES’ AWARD SYSTEM
In response to the call of mission, survivors complete quests to rank up & unlock cooler shooting gun weapons. Kill more zombies, and finish your duty to have a chance to become legendary in sniper offline games. Weird achievements are always the best-paid in zombie survival games!

SIMPLE & ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
Shooting games’ auto-fire system helps zombie shooters focus more on the undead.

Modern control that brings you fun & addictive combat. Cover all the exits, your duty is to shoot zombies and save yourself! It’s shooting time on the battlefield. Call your best sniper & shooter on the frontline. Walk yourself into the resident evil, be quick on the trigger, and survive in this free sniper 3d game!

ADDICTIVE FREE OFFLINE GAMES
DEAD TARGET is one of the offline games, which means you can shoot zombies anytime you want! We recommend wifi to download this offline shooting game, but you don't need wifi to play.

REALISTIC SNIPER GAMES OFFLINE GRAPHIC
In shooting games, players can enjoy 3D graphics of the zombie infection in games without wifi. You can also experience different sound effects from various epic shooting guns in these offline games.

COMPETIVE LEADERBOARD
Raise the gun and pull the trigger, state your values by recording your killing score to know who the best killer in this offline gun game is. Shoot the most zombies and become legendary in offline games!

Survive to the end of the zombie war and build a new world until days gone!

Download & fight against the zombie apocalypse in DEAD TARGET for free now! This killing game is a fun and free gun game that you should try!

Play our other free fps games for fun: Sniper Zombies; Zombie Hunter
descriptionShort: Ready! Aim! Shoot! Zombie Shooter in Offline non-stop action!

creator: VNG GAME STUDIOS
descriptionHtml:
★ Join with up to 125 MILLION zombie shooters in offline sniper games ★

Dead Target - free offline games 2022 is an addictive shooting game with fps themes! An easy control system that brings you a perfect shooting time killer adventure, remember it is an offline game.

Keep your defense up, your finger on the trigger, and shoot evil zombies in DEAD TARGET.

In 2040, the zombie apocalypse began. A sniper team was hired to head to the warfare, collect guns & save residential areas! These could be your last days on Earth, your last hope as a resident surviving is to join them.

Fight for survival in a zombie apocalypse with shooting games. If you don’t want to be a dead resident, don’t deny your duty, try your best to aim in these free gun games!

This offline fps game is one of the shooting games where you can:

- Kill evil zombies with legendary 3D fps weapons
- Upgrade guns and snipers to face up to non-stop zombie attacks
- Experience 3D shooting as an accurate fps engine
- Into the dead, slay zombies of all evil types
-----
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE – CAN YOU SURVIVE?
Non-stop attacks in this shooting game are coming to the frontier. Attack zombies before the invasion come to you since the evil dead can go anytime in these zombie games. Days gone after the survival duty and you can call yourself a hero!

JOIN BATTLE PASS TO COLLECT SPECIAL GUNS & MORE!
Battle Pass - An opportunity in this free game to collect survival items that can't be collected in normal mode. A series of new guns appear only once for survivors. Join the duty now to attack the evil dead and win the battle in the ultimate killing game!

INSANE FPS GAME
In this 3d fps game, zombies are designed with various deadly killing abilities. They’re not stupid. Shooters can also find loads of zombie types in this offline shooting game!

The evil dead are harming the residents, let’s hunt them down & become the best hunter!

UNIQUE GUNS
Ready to attack any evil with the huge range of arsenal. 50 deadly shooting guns & more to come for a thrilling experience in sniper games. You can upgrade and customize guns with skins to be an excellent killer in shooting games offline.

APPEALING OFFLINE FPS GAMES’ AWARD SYSTEM
In response to the call of mission, survivors complete quests to rank up & unlock cooler shooting gun weapons. Kill more zombies, and finish your duty to have a chance to become legendary in sniper offline games. Weird achievements are always the best-paid in zombie survival games!

SIMPLE & ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
Shooting games’ auto-fire system helps zombie shooters focus more on the undead.

Modern control that brings you fun & addictive combat. Cover all the exits, your duty is to shoot zombies and save yourself! It’s shooting time on the battlefield. Call your best sniper & shooter on the frontline. Walk yourself into the resident evil, be quick on the trigger, and survive in this free sniper 3d game!

ADDICTIVE FREE OFFLINE GAMES
DEAD TARGET is one of the offline games, which means you can shoot zombies anytime you want! We recommend wifi to download this offline shooting game, but you don't need wifi to play.

REALISTIC SNIPER GAMES OFFLINE GRAPHIC
In shooting games, players can enjoy 3D graphics of the zombie infection in games without wifi. You can also experience different sound effects from various epic shooting guns in these offline games.

COMPETIVE LEADERBOARD
Raise the gun and pull the trigger, state your values by recording your killing score to know who the best killer in this offline gun game is. Shoot the most zombies and become legendary in offline games!

Survive to the end of the zombie war and build a new world until days gone!

Download & fight against the zombie apocalypse in DEAD TARGET for free now! This killing game is a fun and free gun game that you should try!

Play our other free fps games for fun: Sniper Zombies; Zombie Hunter
descriptionShort: No nonsense Shooting game. Survive in fun zombie game !

title: Dead Target: Zombie Games 3D

container.value: 182 Le Dai Hanh, Ward 15, District 11, HCMC

creator: VNG GAME STUDIOS
descriptionHtml:
★ Join with up to 125 MILLION zombie shooters in offline sniper games ★

Dead Target - free offline zombie game is an addictive shooting game with fps themes! An easy system that brings you a perfect zombie shooting killer adventure, remember it is an offline game.

Keep your defense up, your finger on the trigger, shoot zombie in offline DEAD TARGET.

In 2040, the zombie apocalypse began. A sniper team was hired to head to the warfare, shooting zombie & save the city! These could be your last days on Earth, your last hope is to join them in shooting zombie.

Fight for survival in a zombie apocalypse with shooting games. If you don’t want to be a dead resident, don’t deny your duty, try your best to aim zombie in these free gun games!

This offline fps games is one of the shooting games where you can:

- Shooting zombie with legendary 3D fps weapons
- Upgrade guns and snipers to face up to non-stop zombie attacks
- Experience 3D offline shooting as a fps engine
- Into the dead, slay zombies of all evil types

---

ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE – CAN YOU SURVIVE?
Non-stop attacks in this shooting zombie game are coming to the frontier. Attack zombie before the invasion come to you since the evil dead can go anytime in these offline zombie shooting games. Days gone after the survival duty.

JOIN BATTLE PASS TO COLLECT SPECIAL GUNS & MORE!
Battle Pass - An opportunity in this free game to collect survival items that can't be collected in normal mode. A series of new guns appear only once for survivors. Join the duty now to attack the evil dead and win the battle in the ultimate killing game!

INSANE FPS GAME
In this 3d offline shooting fps game, zombies are designed with various deadly killing abilities. They’re not stupid. Shooters can also find loads of zombie types in this offline shooting game!

The evil dead are harming the residents, let’s hunt them down & become the best hunter!

UNIQUE GUNS
Ready to attack any evil with the huge range of arsenal. 50 deadly shooting guns & more to come for a thrilling experience in sniper games. You can upgrade and customize guns with skins to be an excellent killer in shooting games offline.

APPEALING OFFLINE FPS GAMES’ AWARD SYSTEM
In response to the call of mission, survivors complete quests to rank up & unlock cooler shooting gun weapons. Kill more zombies, and finish your duty to have a chance to become legendary in sniper offline games. Weird achievements are always the best-paid in zombie survival games!

SIMPLE & ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
Shooting games’ auto-fire system helps zombie shooters focus on the undead zombies.

Offline modern control that brings you fun & addictive combat. Cover all the exits, your duty is to shoot zombies and save yourself! It’s shooting time on the battlefield. Call your best sniper & shooter on the frontline. Walk yourself into the resident evil, be quick on the trigger, and survive in this free sniper 3d game!

ADDICTIVE FREE OFFLINE GAMES
DEAD TARGET is one of the offline games, which means you can shoot zombies anytime! We recommend wifi to download this offline zombies shooting game, but you don't need wifi to play.

REALISTIC SNIPER GAMES OFFLINE GRAPHIC
In shooting games, players can enjoy 3D graphics of the zombie infection in games without wifi. You can also experience epic zombies shooting guns in these offline games.

COMPETIVE LEADERBOARD
Raise the gun and pull the trigger, state your values by recording your killing score to know who the best killer in this offline zombies gun game is. Shoot the most zombies and become legendary in offline games!

Survive to the end of the zombie war and build a new world free of zombies.

Download & fight against the zombie apocalypse in DEAD TARGET for free now! This killing game is a fun and free gun game that you should try!

Play our other free fps games for fun: Sniper Zombies; Zombie Hunter
descriptionShort: No nonsense zombie shooter game. Survive in fun offline gun game!

title:
Dead Target: Zombie Games 3D
4.125.0

container.value: Z06, Street 13, Tan Thuan Dong Ward, District 7, HCMC, 700000, Vietnam

creator: VNGGames Studios
descriptionHtml:
★最大1億人がプレイする狙撃ゲームで、ゾンビシューターになって世界を救おう★

防御力を維持し、ゾンビを撃て。DEAD TARGET はオフラインでプレイできるゾンビ シューティングゲームの名作です。

2040年、ゾンビによる世界の終末が始まりました。特別に選ばれたスナイパー部隊が戦争に向かい、銃を集めて人類を救います。

オフラインシューティングゲームでゾンビが徘徊する終末の世界で生き残るために戦ってください。死にたくなければ、この無料ゾンビ狙撃ゲームでベストを尽くすしかありません！

このオフラインゾンビゲームは、次のことができる狙撃ゲームです。
-伝説の3D武器と魅力的なスキンを使いゾンビを殺す
-ノンストップのゾンビ攻撃に備え銃とスナイパーをアップグレードする
-3Dシューティングアクションで真に迫るゾンビシューティングを体験する
-多種多様なタイプのゾンビを殺す
-------

ゾンビが蔓延する終末の世界–生き残ることができますか？
ノンストップで襲い来るゾンビを迎え撃つシューティングゲームです。オフラインでプレイできるこのゲームでは、いつでもゾンビが来る可能性があるため、侵入される前にゾンビを撃たなければなりません。ゾンビを殺し、終末の世界を生き延びましょう！
トリガーに指を置いて、射撃の準備をしてください。ゾンビは予期せず現れます。

バトルパスに参加して、特別な銃やアイテムを集めましょう！
バトルパスは、この無料ゲームで、通常のゲームモードでは収集できない特別なアイテムを収集する機会です。さまざまな新しいアイテム、新しい銃、スキンは1回だけ表示されます。それが、そのアイテムを取得する唯一のチャンスです。ゾンビを倒し、今すぐ参加して究極の殺戮ゲームで戦いに勝ちましょう！

斬新なゾンビゲームデザイン
この3Dゾンビゲームでは、ゾンビはさまざまな殺害能力を備えています。ウイルスに極端に感染しているゾンビの可能性もあります。プレイヤーを襲うゾンビには無数のタイプが存在します。

オフラインで使える幅広いユニークな銃
武器を大量に準備してください。オフライン狙撃ゲームでスリル満点の体験をするために、20種類以上の殺傷力に優れた銃が登場します。スキンで銃をカスタマイズして、キラーの身なりを演出することもできます。

魅力的なアワードシステム
プレイヤーはクエストを完了するごとに、ランクアップしてよりクールなオフライン武器をアンロックできます。より多くのゾンビを倒せば、伝説のスナイパーになるチャンスがあります。奇妙な成果はゾンビゲームでは最高の報酬です！

シンプルでハマってしまうゲームプレイ
自動連射システムにより、ゾンビシューターはアンデッドの射撃と生存に集中してプレイできます。
最新式のコントロールで中毒性のある戦闘を楽しめます。ゾンビを撃ち殺して自分の命を守りましょう！今こそ戦場で行動を起こす時です。最高のスナイパーと射撃の名手を召集してください。倒すまで撃ちまくり、抜群に面白い無料スナイパー3Dゲームで生き残りましょう！

クセになる無料ゾンビゲーム
DEAD TARGETは、オフラインでプレイできる狙撃ゲームの名作です。いつでもどこでもゾンビを撃つことができます。ゲームのダウンロードにはWi-Fiをお勧めしますが、プレイするのにWi-Fiは必要ありません。

オフラインでもリアリティのあるグラフィックス
プレーヤーは、Wi-Fiなしのプレイでも3Dグラフィックスでゾンビ感染の世界を体験できます。趣向を凝らしたさまざまな銃の迫力あるサウンドもオフラインで楽しめます。

各プレイヤーの成績がわかるリーダーボード
自分のプレイのキル数を他と比較して、このゾンビ狙撃ゲームの最高の殺人者は誰かを確認できます。最も多くのゾンビを倒して、伝説のスナイパーになりましょう！

DEAD TARGETを今すぐ無料でダウンロードしましょう！最高のゾンビゲームをぜひお楽しみください！
descriptionShort: やみつきになるスマホゾンビシューティングゲーム - オフラインでプレイして楽しもう！

descriptionHtml:
★ Join with up to 200 MILLION zombie shooters in offline sniper games ★

Dead Target - free offline zombie game is an addictive shooting game with fps themes! An easy system that brings you a perfect zombie shooting killer adventure, remember it is an offline game.

Keep your defense up, your finger on the trigger, shoot zombie in offline DEAD TARGET.

In 2040, the zombie apocalypse began. A sniper team was hired to head to the warfare, shooting zombie & save the city! These could be your last days on Earth, your last hope is to join them in shooting zombie.

Fight for survival in a zombie apocalypse with shooting games. If you don’t want to be a dead resident, don’t deny your duty, try your best to aim zombie in these free gun games!

This offline fps games is one of the shooting games where you can:

- Shooting zombie with legendary 3D fps weapons
- Upgrade guns and snipers to face up to non-stop zombie attacks
- Experience 3D offline shooting as a fps engine
- Into the dead, slay zombies of all evil types

---

ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE – CAN YOU SURVIVE?
Non-stop attacks in this shooting zombie game are coming to the frontier. Attack zombie before the invasion come to you since the evil dead can go anytime in these offline zombie shooting games. Days gone after the survival duty.

JOIN BATTLE PASS TO COLLECT SPECIAL GUNS & MORE!
Battle Pass - An opportunity in this free game to collect survival items that can't be collected in normal mode. A series of new guns appear only once for survivors. Join the duty now to attack the evil dead and win the battle in the ultimate killing game!

INSANE FPS GAME
In this 3d offline shooting fps game, zombies are designed with various deadly killing abilities. They’re not stupid. Shooters can also find loads of zombie types in this offline shooting game!

The evil dead are harming the residents, let’s hunt them down & become the best hunter!

UNIQUE GUNS
Ready to attack any evil with the huge range of arsenal. 50 deadly shooting guns & more to come for a thrilling experience in sniper games. You can upgrade and customize guns with skins to be an excellent killer in shooting games offline.

APPEALING OFFLINE FPS GAMES’ AWARD SYSTEM
In response to the call of mission, survivors complete quests to rank up & unlock cooler shooting gun weapons. Kill more zombies, and finish your duty to have a chance to become legendary in sniper offline games. Weird achievements are always the best-paid in zombie survival games!

SIMPLE & ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
Shooting games’ auto-fire system helps zombie shooters focus on the undead zombies.

Offline modern control that brings you fun & addictive combat. Cover all the exits, your duty is to shoot zombies and save yourself! It’s shooting time on the battlefield. Call your best sniper & shooter on the frontline. Walk yourself into the resident evil, be quick on the trigger, and survive in this free sniper 3d game!

ADDICTIVE FREE OFFLINE GAMES
DEAD TARGET is one of the offline games, which means you can shoot zombies anytime! We recommend wifi to download this offline zombies shooting game, but you don't need wifi to play.

REALISTIC SNIPER GAMES OFFLINE GRAPHIC
In shooting games, players can enjoy 3D graphics of the zombie infection in games without wifi. You can also experience epic zombies shooting guns in these offline games.

COMPETIVE LEADERBOARD
Raise the gun and pull the trigger, state your values by recording your killing score to know who the best killer in this offline zombies gun game is. Shoot the most zombies and become legendary in offline games!

Survive to the end of the zombie war and build a new world free of zombies.

Download & fight against the zombie apocalypse in DEAD TARGET for free now! This killing game is a fun and free gun game that you should try!
